Greetings to Russian President
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Russian President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin on the occasion of the national day of the Russian Federation.
 Kim in the message expressed conviction that the long-standing bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow in scope and strength in all fields on the basis of the new inter-state treaty and wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the socio-political stability and sustainable economic growth of the country.

Greetings to Russian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Yefimovich Fradkov on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the Russian national day.
 The message expressed the conviction that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in different fields and wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the sustained progress of the economy.    
 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Russian counterpart Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the same occasion.

Preparatory Committee for Function in DPRK Formed in U.S.
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for the "Meeting Praising the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu" was inaugurated in the United States on May 30.
 John Paul Cupp, chairman of the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to make every possible effort to widely introduce the greatness of the three generals of Mt. Paektu and the Songun politics of the DPRK among American adherents to the Songun politics as part of its activities for expressing solidarity with Korea of Songun.

articles.content:
Greetings to Philippine President
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Philippine President Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo on the occasion of the 107th
anniversary of the national day of the Republic of the Philippines.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in various fields, the message wished her success in her work for peace and development of the country.

Greetings to British Queen
    Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Elizabeth II, queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, on her official birthday.
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished her good health and happiness.
